blog.title: Dark And Kawaii Writings
blog.description:
Requests/ Fantasies = CLOSED 
It’s YA Boi Kiwi The Shark Advocate!!!! 
*air horn noises*
Thirsty weeb trash queen that enjoys writing for
 ★ My Hero Academia + Villains ★ Naruto ★

body:
🎄⛄️❄️

On the first day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

A crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the second day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Two Todorokies and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the third day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree!!!

On the Fourth day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the fifth day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the sixth day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Six gloves on Shigaraki, Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the seventh day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Seven stab wounds with a smiling Toga, Six gloves on Shigaraki, Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the eighth day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Eight tentacles and Tamaki, Seven stab wounds with a smiling Toga, Six gloves on Shigaraki, Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the ninth day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Nine Presents in All Might’s hands, Eight tentacles and Tamaki, Seven stab wounds with a smiling Toga, Six gloves on Shigaraki, Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the tenth day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Ten tokoyaki in Fatgum’s mouth, Nine Presents in All Might’s hands, Eight tentacles and Tamaki, Seven stab wounds with a smiling Toga, Six gloves on Shigaraki, Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the eleventh day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Eleven students singing, Ten tokoyaki in Fatgum’s mouth, Nine Presents in All Might’s hands, Eight tentacles and Tamaki, Seven stab wounds with a smiling Toga, Six gloves on Shigaraki, Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

On the twelfth day of Christmas my true love sent to me:

Twelve sexy my hero babies in my bed, Eleven students singing, Ten tokoyaki in Fatgum’s mouth, Nine Presents in All Might’s hands, Eight tentacles and Tamaki, Seven stab wounds with a smiling Toga, Six gloves on Shigaraki, Five students chained by Midnight, four students holding down Bakugou, three cats napping on Aizawa, two Todoroki’s, and a crying Deku under a Pear Tree.

~ Love Kinky Kiwi xoxo

summary: I'm gonna sue you for being so cute and stealing me heart Shinsou. You have to pay for your crimes.

summary: Hey Deku, how did you deal with your nervousness during the UA entrance exam? I have high school entrance exams coming up and...
question: Hey Deku, how did you deal with your nervousness during the UA entrance exam? I have high school entrance exams coming up and I’m kinda anxious about it😅 Funny enough, one of the schools I’m applying to is actually called ‘UA’ for short! :p
answer: Midoriya: “It was hard, but I just thought about how much I wanted this. The anxiety was always there, but I tried to ignore it and push through it because I knew I needed to do my best on the exam. It’s okay to feel anxious. That’s normal, especially when you’re taking an exam. So just try to focus, okay? Try to put all of your energy into taking the exam. And afterwards, you’ll feel good because you’ll know that you did your best!”

reblog.comment: Midoriya: “It was hard, but I just thought about how much I wanted this. The anxiety was always there, but I tried to ignore it and push through it because I knew I needed to do my best on the exam. It’s okay to feel anxious. That’s normal, especially when you’re taking an exam. So just try to focus, okay? Try to put all of your energy into taking the exam. And afterwards, you’ll feel good because you’ll know that you did your best!”

trail.content_raw: Midoriya: “It was hard, but I just thought about how much I wanted this. The anxiety was always there, but I tried to ignore it and push through it because I knew I needed to do my best on the exam. It’s okay to feel anxious. That’s normal, especially when you’re taking an exam. So just try to focus, okay? Try to put all of your energy into taking the exam. And afterwards, you’ll feel good because you’ll know that you did your best!”
trail.content: Midoriya: “It was hard, but I just thought about how much I wanted this. The anxiety was always there, but I tried to ignore it and push through it because I knew I needed to do my best on the exam. It’s okay to feel anxious. That’s normal, especially when you’re taking an exam. So just try to focus, okay? Try to put all of your energy into taking the exam. And afterwards, you’ll feel good because you’ll know that you did your best!”

blog.name: edcom02
blog.title: edCOM02 Tumblr
blog.description: An DeviantArt artist who likes anime, game, and superhero crossovers.

summary: My Hero Academia x Godzilla.  As I was aware of the shout out to Godzilla in "Two Heroes" in the form of Pro-Hero Godzillo as...
caption:
My Hero Academia x Godzilla. 

As I was aware of the shout out to Godzilla in “Two Heroes” in the form of Pro-Hero Godzillo as well as excited for the new Legendary Godzilla movie coming in the next year, I felt the need to draw this. The monster roster consists of Godzilla, Mothra, Rodan and King Ghidorah, with the MHA roster here consisting of Izuku Midoriya, Katsuki Bakugou, Ochako Uraraka, Shoto Todoroki and Mina Ashido. I even included Miki Saegusa from the Hensei Godzilla series since I felt her psychic powers could work as a Quirk.

tags: i really need his real name
question: HAWKS PROMPT #39 AND #44
answer:
39. “I love you. I just love her more.”

44. “This is a totally inappropriate soundtrack.”

i had no idea how to combine these so this is me, winging it ( lmao pun intended )

love the all caps tho

• Hawks didn’t think he’d regret this decision, but now, he sees you sitting on the floor, being played with instead of him, and he decides he regrets this decision very much

• “I’m going to put her up for adoption if I don’t get attention in the next five minutes,” he grumbles and points and the tiny puppy dog tripping over your legs, “You’re supposed to be loving me right now, it’s my day off,” he complains.

• “I love you. I just love her more,” you respond while ruffling the pups ears

• Hawks slumped in his chair overdramatically and pulled out his phone

• The surround sound speakers installed in the ceiling started to play Someone Like You by Adele and he laughed, “This is a totally inappropriate soundtrack.”

• “Nope,” you said and picked up the wiggling puppy who pawed at your shirt, “This is my new love of my life.”

• Hawks gasped

• Hawks didn’t think he’d regret this decision, but now, he sees you sitting on the floor, being played with instead of him, and he decides he regrets this decision very much

• “I’m going to put her up for adoption if I don’t get attention in the next five minutes,” he grumbles and points and the tiny puppy dog tripping over your legs, “You’re supposed to be loving me right now, it’s my day off,” he complains.

• “I love you. I just love her more,” you respond while ruffling the pups ears

• Hawks slumped in his chair overdramatically and pulled out his phone

• The surround sound speakers installed in the ceiling started to play Someone Like You by Adele and he laughed, “This is a totally inappropriate soundtrack.”

• “Nope,” you said and picked up the wiggling puppy who pawed at your shirt, “This is my new love of my life.”

• Hawks gasped

44. “This is a totally inappropriate soundtrack.”

• Hawks didn’t think he’d regret this decision, but now, he sees you sitting on the floor, being played with instead of him, and he decides he regrets this decision very much

• “I’m going to put her up for adoption if I don’t get attention in the next five minutes,” he grumbles and points and the tiny puppy dog tripping over your legs, “You’re supposed to be loving me right now, it’s my day off,” he complains.

• “I love you. I just love her more,” you respond while ruffling the pups ears

• Hawks slumped in his chair overdramatically and pulled out his phone

• The surround sound speakers installed in the ceiling started to play Someone Like You by Adele and he laughed, “This is a totally inappropriate soundtrack.”

• “Nope,” you said and picked up the wiggling puppy who pawed at your shirt, “This is my new love of my life.”

• Hawks gasped
